import React from "react"; import "./Cards.css"; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import CardItem from "./CardItem"; import Invitation from "./invitation"; import SearchRecipes from "./SearchRecipes"; import {mostPopular} from '../DAL/api' function Cards() { const [recipes, setRecipes] = useState([]) useEffect(async () => { const getRecipes = await mostPopular() setRecipes(getRecipes) }, []) return (
); } export default Cards;
